marklogic.body:
Bar of Milk cooking chocolate 6-8oz of cereal - Rice krispies, corn Flakes etc
Melt chocolate in a bowl over hot water, careful not to Burn it, then add the cereal. stir until completely mixed then either put into cake cases or a large baking tin and refridgerate until set. If using large baking tin when set cut into oblong or squares. Then enjoy !
You could also add either small marshmallows, glace cherries or raisins to the mix.
